```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

start = read.csv(("start.csv"), header=FALSE)
colnames(start) <- c("PID","sequence","start")

end = read.csv(("end.csv"), header=FALSE)
colnames(end) <- c("PID","sequence","end")

time = merge(start, end, by=c("PID", "sequence")) %>%
  mutate(time = end-start) %>% 
  select(c("PID","sequence","time"))

his = ggplot(data=time, aes(x=time)) +
  geom_histogram()

ggplotly(his)

time = time %>%
  filter(time < 5000) %>%
  mutate(threads = row_number())

time = time %>% 
   mutate(cumulative = cumsum(time))

line = ggplot(data=time, aes(x=threads, y=time)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()

ggplotly(line)

line2 = ggplot(data=time, aes(x=threads, y=cumulative)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()

ggplotly(line2)
```
